title: [Large-scale] Correctional Officer Reality-Based Self-Defense Skill Application Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic self-defense techniques and fundamental knowledge of correctional work
context.additional_context: A project-based learning course designed around reality-based scenario assessments to help current correctional officers effectively apply self-defense techniques in actual work environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-defense techniques with over 80% accuracy in three or more reality-based scenarios
Learners can collaboratively develop and execute response strategies in complex threat situations with team members
Learners can establish continuous improvement plans for self-defense techniques with over 90% participation in post-training scenario evaluations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
